desc.description: a string with a length from 0 to 16384

idAttachmentCover.description: Id of the image attachment of this card to use as its cover, or null for no cover

idBoard.description: id of the board the card should be moved to

idCardSource.description: The id of the card to copy into a new card.

idLabels.description: A comma-separated list of objectIds, 24-character hex strings

idList.description: id of the list that the card should be added to

idMembers.description: A comma-separated list of objectIds, 24-character hex strings

keepFromSource.description: Properties of the card to copy over from the source.

labels.description: all or a comma-separated list of: blue, green, orange, purple, red or yellow

name.description: The name of the new card.  It isn't required if the name is being copied from provided by a URL, file or card that is being copied.

pos.description: A position. top , bottom , or a positive number.

urlSource.description: A URL starting with http:// or https:// or null
